content: साहसं [सहसा बलेन निर्वृत्तं अण्] {@--1@} Violence, force, rapine; <ls>Ms. 7. 48.</ls> {@--2@} Any criminal act (such as robbery, rape, felony &c.), a heinous crime, an aggressive act. {@--3@} Cruelty, oppression; <ls>Śi. 9. 59.</ls> {@--4@} Boldness, daring, daring courage; साहसे श्रीः प्रतिवसति <ls>Mk. 4.</ls> {@--5@} Precipitation, rashness, temerity, an inconsiderate or reckless act, a rash or daring act; तदपि साहसाभासं <ls>Māl. 2</ls>; किमपरमतो निर्व्यूढं यत्करार्पणसाहसं <ls n="Māl.">9. 10</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 191</ls>; <ls>Ki. 17. 42.</ls> {@--6@} Punishment, chastisement, fine ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} also in this sense), see <ls>Ms. 8. 138</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 66</ls>, <ls n="Y. 1.">365.</ls>
